11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Samurah bin Jundab narrated that:The Messenger of Allah said: "Whichever woman is given in marriage by two Wali, then her case is in accordance with the first of them, and whoever sells something to two men, then it is for the first of them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوَلِيَّيْنِ يُزَوِّجَانِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Two Wali Giving The Same Woman In Marriage
